description:
The Mardook Mobile Fortress is the largest mobile carrier for the entire Mardook fleet. The massive vessel, some 50 kilometers wide, is commanded by Lord Emperor Ingues. From this giant vessel Ingues rules all the Mardook forces.
Source: http://www.macross2.net/m3/macross2/mardook-mobilefortress.htm
name: Mordook Haha Kan
